folder: Allen Street & Stanton Street, Manhattan, NY
text:
Allen Street at the N.E. corner of Stanton Street.
June 21, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.

folder: Allen Street & Stanton Street, Manhattan, NY
text:
Allen Street, east side, north from Stanton St., showing the cleared area caused by widening of this thoroughfare. To the left is the 2nd Ave. "El" line and its 1st Street Station.

View 1: February 17, 1928
View 2: April 1, 1934

P. L. Sperr

folder: Allen Street & Stanton Street, Manhattan, NY
text:
181-207 Allen Street, west side, from Stanton to Houston Streets. These buildings have been shaved preparatory to widening the street.

February 17, 1928.

P. L. Sperr.
